name: amasty/module-blog-pro-subscription-package
description: Blog Pro Subscription Package by Amasty

suggest.amasty/module-blog-hyva: Install this package to ensure the Blog Pro extension works with Hyvä Theme.
suggest.amasty/module-ai-blog-pro-content-genera: Install this package for ChatGPT AI Content Generator compatibility.
suggest.amasty/blog-sitemap: Install this package to add the compatibility with Magento 2 XML sitemap functionality for Blog Posts.
